Plot
After escaping from a Huntsville prison, convict 
Butch Haynes and his partner Terry Pugh kidnap a 
young boy, Philip Perry, and flee across Texas. 
As they travel together, Butch and Philip discover 
common bonds and suffer the abuses of the outside 
"Perfect World." In pursuit is Texas Ranger "Red" 
Garnett and criminologist Sally Gerber.
